sections.heading: Briefs; payment for printing by county
sections.text: The cost of printing briefs on behalf of any person convicted of an offense for which the punishment adjudged is capital shall be paid by the county.SourceLaws 1973, LB 268, ยง 12;Laws 2015, LB268, ยง 35;Referendum 2016, No. 426.Note:The repeal of section 29-2527
